description.narrative: 13.1 Evidence-based programming, policy dialogue/advocacy and results based reporting (with a focus on convergence and equity) are facilitated through systematic data collection and analysis with data disaggregated, including by gender disparities and marginalized populations, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: PCR 13 Cross Sectoral Management Support

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 13.1 Evidence-based programming, policy dialogue/advocacy and results based reporting (with a focus on convergence and equity) are facilitated through systematic data collection and analysis with data disaggregated, including by gender disparities and marginalized populations
% of planned surveys, studies and evaluations as detailed in IMEP completed
% of implemented SSEs with data disaggregated at least by gender, and if possible by livelihood and social/economic status
% of funding allocated to partners in inaccessible locations that is monitored/verified annually by 3rd party systems to ensure that services are being delivered to beneficiaries
Existence of zonal and national IMEPs that are consistently reviewed by multi-sectoral teams

baseline.value: National IMEP available, but not regularly reviewed by CSSE.

title.narrative: Availability of sound M&E Plans for programmes
Evidence of UNICEF programme sections using SomInfo for their data needs

baseline.value: Only SomInfo ToTs trained on SomInfo version 6
